name: Distracted
description:
You play as AJ,  a boy that went on a schooltrip to some island on the sea. After having not paid attention for just a few seconds, he's lost and can't find the group anymore.

Now it's up to him to find his way back to the group, but look out! He's not the only one wandering there~ plus, there are also traps laying everywhere.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

A and D = WALK LEFT / WALK RIGHT

SPACEBAR = JUMP

K = ATTACK/KICK

F1 = DANCE (It has no purpose)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

This is a school project in which I had to make a 2.5D game, I don't think it turned out that good, but oh well, a game's a game :3

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
